channel.title: Adding Tztok-Jad help
channel.description:
Hey guys. I dont have tztok-jad in my npc folder. so i added him. I clicked compile.. no errors.. Im also trying to add other tzhaar monsters to an area. But i get errors like the one below but different monster id's. i only get it for tzhaar monsters.
I got into run server and i get this
[CODE] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 745 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:871) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:26) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594[/CODE]
2745 is tztok jad. and it says i have error :(
BTW: DOES ANYONE KNOW HOW TO MAKE UR SERVER HAVE SNOW?? [br][size=1]Posted at: August 16, 2006, 11:27:35 PM[/size][hr]bump pls help

item.title: Adding Tztok-Jad help
item.dc:creator: @wooker wooker
item.description:
@wooker wrote:

also it may be because your missing tabs either side of the npc code…that happene to me when i used tuts…people forgetting tabs…ill post my autospawn for jad just edit the co-ords with yours[br][size=1]Posted at: August 18, 2006, 05:03:51 AM[/size][hr]spawn = 2745 2396 5140 0 2491 5174 2485 5168 2 TzTok-Jad
2396 and 5140 are the co-ords…edit them to where you want jad to be
ALWAYS remember tabs =\ i didnt know wtf was happening with my tzhaar guys either but it was cuz there wre spaces not tabs

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Tztok-Jad help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

and dont forgot healt otherwise it wil crash

Read full topic

@hellou wrote:

delete what you put in and put this in

npc = 2745	Tok-Xil				702	800

item.title: Adding Tztok-Jad help

item.description:

[quote=“Danny15, post:1, topic:9818”]Hey guys. I dont have tztok-jad in my npc folder. so i added him. I clicked compile… no errors…
Im also trying to add other tzhaar monsters to an area. But i get errors like the one below but different monster id’s. i only get it for tzhaar monsters.

I got into run server and i get this

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 745 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497) at NPCHandler.loadNPCList(NPCHandler.java:871) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:21) at server.main(server.java:26) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

2745 is tztok jad. and it says i have error

BTW: DOES ANYONE KNOW HOW TO MAKE UR SERVER HAVE SNOW??
[br][size=1]Posted at: August 16, 2006, 11:27:35 PM[/size][hr]bump pls help[/quote]
Have you put health on him? Just a question.
